AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Hpapi, which interfaces with Hypixel's API to get various data
[p]help Hpapi to see commands. Don't forget to set your key with [p]hpset apikey <your_key>.
If you need a key, log onto mc.hypixel.net and do /api.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: Hpapi
SHORT: Cog for getting info from the Hypixel API
DESCRIPTION: Gets data from the Hypixel API including player stats, guild info, and active boosters
